short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help you monitor networking traffic of your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing **Safe Web Network Monitor** â€“ the ultimate browser extension for monitoring your network traffic. Designed to enhance your browsing security and provide comprehensive insights, Safe Web Network Monitor tracks all network activity, allowing you to stay informed about data exchanges and potential threats. Whether you're concerned about privacy or need to diagnose network issues, this extension offers an easy-to-use interface with powerful analytics to keep your web experience safe and transparent. Install Safe Web Network Monitor today and take control of your online security.
